text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump You are insane. You have tens of thousands of people dead. It’s utterly disgraceful what Trump & the US federal govt is letting happen in your country. The world is watching in absolute horror. You are not leading anything but the death rate. #COVID19  #TrumpLiedPeopleDied
